thread.title: Kroger Nears Its Sell-By Date
thread.title_full: Kroger Nears Its Sell-By Date - WSJ

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Kroger Nears Its Sell-By Date
text:
The latest innovation on tap at Kroger Co.: beer.
Select stores have installed kegs of craft brews where customers can fill their own mugs. But, perhaps like some overenthusiastic customers, Kroger shareholders are seeing double these days. In a move associated with highfliers such as Netflix Inc. and Apple Inc., the supermarket chain felt the need to split its stock and cut the price in half.
That is remarkable for a...
